publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2035 Robin Harper: Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Bathgate Thistle for winning the Scottish Junior Cup for the first time in their history; believes that the cup has a significant place in Scotland’s football calendar; congratulates all those involved in organising it, and wishes Bathgate Thistle all the very best in celebrating this famous victory.

S3M-2035 Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 2 June 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*, Aileen Campbell*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, John Wilson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jim Tolson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-2035 Robin Harper: Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Bathgate Thistle for winning the Scottish Junior Cup for the first time in their history; believes that the cup has a significant place in Scotland’s football calendar; congratulates all those involved in organising it, and wishes Bathgate Thistle all the very best in celebrating this famous victory. Supported by: Angela Constance*, Patrick Harvie*, Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-2035 Robin Harper: Congratulations to Bathgate Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Bathgate Thistle for winning the Scottish Junior Cup for the first time in their history; believes that the cup has a significant place in Scotland’s football calendar; congratulates all those involved in organising it, and wishes Bathgate Thistle all the very best in celebrating this famous victory. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Sandra White, Gil Paterson, Aileen Campbell, Shirley-Anne Somerville, John Wilson, Bashir Ahmad, Alasdair Allan, Jamie McGrigor, Jim Tolson, Patricia Ferguson, Bill Kidd, Angela Constance, Patrick Harvie, Dr Richard Simpson
